description.plain:
The Backseat Lovers are a four-piece indie rock band hailing from Salt Lake City. The group is made up of Josh Harmon (lead vocals/guitar), Jonas Swanson (lead guitar/vocals), KJ Ward (bass), and Juice Welch (drums).

Josh Harmon had heard of local drummer Juice Welch and approached him about starting a band. They began arranging songs right away. Soon after, at a failed open-mic night, Harmon met Jonas Swanson, who became the lead guitarist. At the band’s first meeting, Swanson brought along Ethan Christensen as a bass, and their first single, “Out of Tune”, was born from a song Harmon had written at age 16.

The band hit the studio in the spring of 2018, releasing a self-produced EP titled Elevator Days on June 3rd, 2018, and their first show followed the release by a few weeks.

In August of 2018, the Lovers began recording a record, described by lead vocalist Harmon as “a collection of songs that showcases the band’s writing chemistry on a whole new level.” The full-length LP was last scheduled to release in January of 2019.

Their major label debut album “Waiting to Spill” was released on October 28th, 2022.

The Backseat Lovers are a four-piece indie rock band hailing from Salt Lake City. The group is made up of Josh Harmon (lead vocals/guitar), Jonas Swanson (lead guitar/vocals), KJ Ward (bass), and Juice Welch (drums).

Josh Harmon had heard of local drummer Juice Welch and approached him about starting a band. They began arranging songs right away. Soon after, at a failed open-mic night, Harmon met Jonas Swanson, who became the lead guitarist. At the band’s first meeting, Swanson brought along Ethan Christensen as a bass, and their first single, “Out of Tune”, was born from a song Harmon had written at age 16.

The band hit the studio in the spring of 2018, releasing a self-produced EP titled Elevator Days on June 3rd, 2018, and their first show followed the release by a few weeks.

In August of 2018, the Lovers began recording a record, described by lead vocalist Harmon as “a collection of songs that showcases the band’s writing chemistry on a whole new level.” The full-length LP was last scheduled to release in January of 2019.

Their major label debut album “Waiting to Spill” was released on October 28th, 2022.

songs.full_title: What You Know by Two Door Cinema Club
songs.title: What You Know

songs.lyrics:
21 ContributorsKilby Girl Lyrics[Verse 1]
We're both throwing smoke into the night
It's raining, I suppose that you need a ride
She said, "I've got nothin' to do and neither do you
There's a place down the road where we can waste the whole afternoon"

[Chorus]
I overheard that she was nineteen
She's got a fake ID and a nose ring
Those kind of girls tend to know things
Better than I do
And I'm dying
To figure out what she's hiding
She's playing it cool but she's lying
Better than I do

[Verse 2]
Feels like a night to carry a tune
I've been carrying yours since you wrecked my room
And I've got nothin' to do and neither do you
So we'll chase jack with love
And waste away the whole afternoon

[Chorus]
I overheard that she was nineteen
She's got a fake ID and a nose ring
Those kind of girls tend to know things
Better than I do
And I'm dying
To figure out what she's hiding
She's playing it cool but she's lying
Better than I do
You might also like[Instrumental Outro]7Embed

songs.full_title: Pool House by The Backseat Lovers
songs.title: Pool House

description.plain:
The third single after The Backseat Lovers' EP Elevator Days, and the second song on their debut album.

Pool House is a smooth turned rock point of view story where we roam around a party uncomfortably, trying to find some peace.

83 ContributorsPool House Lyrics[Intro]
This song's called "Dugout"
"Pool House"
"Pool House"
Th-this song's called "Pool House"
One, two, three, four

[Verse 1]
Waiting around for something to change my mood
'Cause I know that what's in this plastic cup isn't going to
Kids on the lawn, stuck in pairs of two
Your lunch is on its way back up but you're still in the pool

[Chorus]
Wait inside
I'll be fine
I guess I'll sit outside
While you change your mind, oh no, woah-oh

[Verse 2]
I'll risk it all to find
A place where I can hear my thoughts
This song is playing too loud
But upstairs they're still making out
I'm getting all choked up
I guess it's just my luck
And I'm stuck on the porch
What am I waiting for?
You might also like[Chorus]
Wait inside
I'll be fine
I guess I'll sit outside
While you change your mind

[Chorus]

I'll be fine
Wait inside
Change your mind
Oh, honey, you'll change your mind6Embed

songs.full_title: Out of Tune by The Backseat Lovers
songs.title: Out of Tune

description.plain: Out of Tune is a tribute to Josh’s childhood and his journey through becoming a musician/singer, starting with when he was when he was young, who he was when he wrote this, and where he hopes to be in the future.

songs.embed_content: Read “Out of Tune” by The Backseat Lovers on Genius

annotatable.link_title: Out of Tune by The Backseat Lovers
annotatable.title: Out of Tune

body.plain: Out of Tune is a tribute to Josh’s childhood and his journey through becoming a musician/singer, starting with when he was when he was young, who he was when he wrote this, and where he hopes to be in the future.

songs.lyrics:
13 ContributorsOut of Tune Lyrics[Intro]
1, 2, 3, 4

[Verse 1]
All the old containers that I fill with my past
You can find them on the second floor under my bed
I miss the days when girls were scary
Scarier than spiders
Walks through the night that didn't take us anywhere
I had funny lookin’ legs
You were funnier than most people knew you were
But I knew you well
We skipped a class or two to write a couple songs
They were always pretty good
'Til the next year we realized that we were wrong

[Verse 2]
You took a prepubescent kid and showed him to the world
Introduced him to rock n' roll, YouTube, and girls
I miss the days when girls were scary
My mama said you were a bad influence
But I’ve never been influenced by anyone that could
Write or sing or make up shit as cool as you did

[Chorus]
You made me who I am
You had my back and I had yours
You had my back and I had yours
We were just a couple of posers with guitars
That were always out of tune
You might also like[Verse 3]
We got a job that paid as low as it could
Folded boxes 'til our hands were stained the color of wood
But the dream that we were dreaming
Didn't die when we were fired
Started a band without a drummer or a mic
Got a show within a week
That I thought would be the show to change my life

[Chorus]
You made me who I am
You had my back and I had yours
You had my back and I had yours
We were just a couple of posers with guitars
That were always out of tune1Embed
